name: fila-backoffice
description: Backoffice para sistema de fila digital

scripts.version:patch: pnpm run version:clean && pnpm version patch --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run version:stage && pnpm run version:deploy
scripts.version:minor: pnpm run version:clean && pnpm version minor --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run version:stage && pnpm run version:deploy
scripts.version:major: pnpm run version:clean && pnpm version major --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run version:stage && pnpm run version:deploy
scripts.version:clean: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); pkg.version = pkg.version.replace(/-stage$/, ''); require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2) + '\n');"
scripts.version:stage: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const [major, minor, patch] = pkg.version.split('.'); pkg.version = major + '.' + minor + '.' + patch + '-stage'; require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2) + '\n');"
scripts.version:deploy: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const version = pkg.version; require('child_process').execSync('git add package.json', {stdio: 'inherit'}); try { require('child_process').execSync('git commit -m \"chore: bump version to ' + version + '\"', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) { console.log('No changes to commit'); } try { require('child_process').execSync('git tag -d ' + version, {stdio: 'pipe'}); } catch(e) {} try { require('child_process').execSync('git push origin :' + version, {stdio: 'pipe'}); } catch(e) {} require('child_process').execSync('git tag ' + version, {stdio: 'inherit'}); require('child_process').execSync('git push origin main', {stdio: 'inherit'}); require('child_process').execSync('git push origin ' + version, {stdio: 'inherit'});"
scripts.version:prod-patch: pnpm version patch --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run version:prod-deploy
scripts.version:prod-minor: pnpm version minor --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run version:prod-deploy
scripts.version:prod-major: pnpm version major --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run version:prod-deploy
scripts.version:prod-deploy: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const version = pkg.version; require('child_process').execSync('git add package.json', {stdio: 'inherit'}); require('child_process').execSync('git commit -m \"chore: release version ' + version + '\"', {stdio: 'inherit'}); require('child_process').execSync('git tag ' + version, {stdio: 'inherit'}); require('child_process').execSync('git push origin main', {stdio: 'inherit'}); require('child_process').execSync('git push origin ' + version, {stdio: 'inherit'});"
